explanation: [0-0] A young man leans against the support of a wooden porch. He is wearing a green shirt, cream pants, and white shoes. He has dyed red hair and wears a necklace and bracelets. He looks backwards. Behind him is a short man wearing a black baseball cap, a dark blue sweatshirt, gray sweatpants, and black shoes. The short man is facing a brown paper bag and holding a green broom. The background is a wooden house with white walls, a glass door, and a neat wooden roof.

[0-4] The tall man raises his leg and sticks his butt out, a puff of white powder comes out from near his buttocks. The man laughs and runs to the side. Behind the tall man hides a short woman with long hair, wearing a pink and gray top, a pink inner shirt, black pants, and shoes, holding a white plastic bottle in her hand. The short woman takes a few steps forward. The short man looks up at what is happening.

[4-10] Then, the scene cuts to an outdoor environment with blue sky and tall trees in the distance, and brown fences in the near distance. Two women, one tall and one short, stand on hardened ground with grass nearby. The tall man walks up to the two women, turns around, sticks his butt out, and a puff of white powder comes out from behind him, spraying onto the faces of the two women. The short woman turns and walks out of the frame. The tall man laughs and runs to the side. The short man beside the tall man walks out of the frame with a box, leaving only the tall woman looking at the scene in shock.
